title: Analysis of g based on analytical info for g' and g'' part - b

content.description: The function g is defined for x>0 with g(1)=2, g'(x)= sin(x+1/x ) , and g''(x)=(1-1/x2 )cos(x+1/x ).
content.question: On what subintervals of (0.12, 1), if any, is the graph of g concave down? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: On what subintervals of (0.12, 1), if any, is the graph of g concave down? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
